scripts.title: Appendix A: Mathematical Foundations
scripts.description: Comprehensive mathematical foundations covering G2 holonomy, spinor structures, differential geometry, and topological invariants.

scripts.title: Appendix B: Computational Methods
scripts.description: Comprehensive documentation of computational techniques including RG equations, threshold corrections, and numerical optimization.

scripts.title: Appendix C: Extended Derivations
scripts.description: Detailed derivations of gauge unification, fermion masses, neutrino mixing, and proton decay from G2 geometry.

scripts.title: Appendix D: Comprehensive Parameter Tables
scripts.description: Complete listing of all physical constants, experimental inputs, geometric parameters, and theory predictions with sources.

scripts.title: Appendix E: Proton Decay Calculation
scripts.description: Detailed calculation of proton decay lifetime from dimension-6 effective operators. Predicts τ_p = 1.3 × 10³⁵ years, testable by Hyper-Kamiokande.

scripts.title: Appendix F: Dimensional Decomposition
scripts.description: Mathematical framework for reducing 26-dimensional (24,2) signature spacetime to 13-dimensional (12,1) physical space via gauge fixing.

scripts.title: Appendix G: Effective Torsion from Flux Quantization
scripts.description: TCS G₂ manifolds are Ricci-flat (geometric torsion τ = 0). The effective torsion arises from G₄ flux quantization, yielding T_ω = -0.875 with Spin(7) spinor fraction correction.

scripts.title: Appendix H: Proton Decay Branching Ratio
scripts.description: The branching ratio BR(p → e⁺π⁰) is predicted from flux orientation on the TCS G₂ manifold. Geometric derivation yields BR = 0.25 from shadow spacetime dimensions.

scripts.title: Appendix I: Gravitational Wave Dispersion
scripts.description: The two-time framework predicts frequency-dependent dispersion for gravitational waves. Dispersion coefficient η emerges from quantum fluctuations in orthogonal time τ, modulated by G₂ torsion effects.

scripts.title: S8 Tension Resolution via Dynamical Dark Energy
scripts.description: Resolves S8 tension between CMB (Planck) and weak lensing (KiDS-1000, DES Y3) through PM's w₀ = -11/13 dark energy. Dynamical dark energy with w₀ < -1/3 suppresses late-time structure growth, reducing S8 by ~3% relative to ΛCDM.

scripts.title: Deriving 4D Gravity from Kaluza-Klein Reduction
scripts.description: Complete derivation of 4D gravity from 26D → 13D → 4D dimensional reduction, including breathing mode, BPS branes, and Pneuma field.

scripts.title: Dark Energy from Dimensional Reduction
scripts.description: Derives dark energy equation of state w₀ = -11/13 from dimensional reduction cascade 26D → 13D → 4D. Shadow dimensions contribute α_shadow ≈ 0.576 to effective dimension D_eff = 12.576.

scripts.title: Multi-Sector Cosmological Dynamics
scripts.description: Computes dark matter abundance, dark energy equation of state, and sector blending from G2 geometry with derived modulation width.

scripts.title: Discussion, Conclusions, and Theory Analysis
scripts.description: Comprehensive discussion including theoretical implications, predictions, falsifiability, validation, and future directions

scripts.title: Proton-Electron Mass Ratio Derivation
scripts.description: Derives m_p/m_e ≈ 1836.15 from G2 manifold topology with zero free parameters

scripts.title: Chirality and Spinorial Structure from G2 Holonomy
scripts.description: Derives fermion chirality from G2 manifold holonomy and spinorial representations. Shows how associative 4-form defines chiral projector, Dirac operator zero modes determine chiral fermion count, and index theorem connects to topology. Links to n_gen = 3 via spinor saturation.

scripts.title: CKM Matrix and Quark Mixing from G2 Phases
scripts.description: Derives CKM matrix elements and CP violation from G2 manifold topological phases. CKM angles emerge from geometric overlaps between quark wave functions on associative 3-cycles. Jarlskog invariant J ~ 3e-5 from holonomy phases.

scripts.title: Fermion Generations from G2 Topology
scripts.description: Derives the number of fermion generations (3) and Yukawa texture from G2 manifold topology via the Pneuma Mechanism. Generation count follows from spinor saturation: n_gen = N_flux / spinor_DOF = 24 / 8 = 3. Yukawa hierarchy from geometric Froggatt-Nielsen with epsilon ~ 0.223.

scripts.title: Gauge Coupling Unification
scripts.description: Compute GUT scale and unified coupling from 3-loop RG evolution with KK and asymptotic safety corrections

scripts.title: Fine Structure Constant Derivation
scripts.description: Derives alpha^-1 ≈ 137.036 from G2 manifold topology with zero free parameters
